nodes.text: Arvina was an astronomical object located in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. During the Imperial Era, the Besalisk Fetya operated an outpost on Arvina, working for the Hidden Hand.

At some point, the Besalisk Fetya set up shop on Arvina and operated as an arms dealer, supplying many clients for decades. When hunting down Darth Vader, Beilert Valance and his crew of bounty hunters visited Fetya's Hollow on Arvina in order to acquire sonic cannons. When the deal went sour, Fetya and her crew threatened to kill Valance and his crew, but he allowed the Galactic Empire to track him there. The Empire destroyed Fetya's Hollow and Darth Vader interrogated and killed Fetya.
Arvina made its debut in the second issue of the 2019 comic book series Star Wars: Target Vader, written by Robbie Thompson.
